# Air-Cooled Thermopile Sensors to 150 W

**Convection, Air-Cooled Thermopile Sensors for Measuring Laser Power to 150 W**

These air-cooled, surface absorbing sensors are intended for measurement of low to medium power pulsed and CW lasers from the 10 mW to 150 W power range.

Convection cooling makes them simple to operate as well as mechanically compact. Product numbers ending in “X” are specifically optimized for use with excimer lasers operating in the ultraviolet (150 nm to 400 nm).

The DB-25 sensor models are compatible with LabMax-Pro, LabMax-TOP/TO, FieldMaxII-TOP/TO/P, and FieldMate meters.

---

## Features

- Maximum powers from 2 W to 150 W
- Minimum power down to 10 mW
- Broadband and Excimer coatings
- Convective air-cooled
- 0.15 μm to 11 μm spectral range
- 19 mm and 50 mm diameter active areas
- DB25 (meter required)
- RoHS Compliant

## Applications

- Medical
- Scientific
- Industrial
- General Laser Power Measurement from mW to 150 W

---

## Specifications

| Specification                | PM2          | PM10         | PM30         |
|------------------------------|--------------|--------------|--------------|
| Wavelength Range (μm)        | 0.25 to 11   | 0.25 to 11   | 0.25 to 11   |
| Power Range                  | 10 mW to 2 W | 10 mW to 10 W| 100 mW to 30 W|
| Long-Pulse Joules Range (J)  | 0.5 to 2     | 0.5 to 10    | 0.5 to 50    |
| Maximum Intermittent Power (<5 min.) (W) | 5 | 30 | 50 |
| Resolution (mW)              | 1            | 1            | 10           |
| Maximum Power Density (kW/cm²) | 6          | 6            | 6            |
| Maximum Energy Density (mJ/cm²) | 600, 1064 nm, 10 ns | 600, 1064 nm, 10 ns | 600, 1064 nm, 10 ns |
| Response Time (sec.)         | 2            | 2            | 2            |
| Detector Coating             | Broadband    | Broadband    | Broadband    |
| Active Area Diameter (mm)    | 19           | 19           | 19           |
| Calibration Uncertainty (%) (k=2) | ±1      | ±1           | ±1           |
| Calibration Wavelength (nm)  | 514          | 514          | 514          |
| Cooling Method               | Air-cooled   | Air-cooled   | Air-cooled   |
| Cable Type                   | PM DB-25     | PM DB-25     | PM DB-25     |
| Cable Length (m)             | 2            | 2            | 2            |
| Part Number                  | 1098329¹     | 1097901¹     | 1098314¹     |

¹ C24 Quick Ship program: eligible for next business day shipment.

---

## Mechanical Specifications

### PM2

- Dimensions: 51 mm (2.0 in) x 19 mm (0.75 in)
- Adjustable: 70 mm (2.8 in)

### PM10

- Dimensions: 51 mm (2.0 in) x 24 mm (0.94 in)
- Adjustable: 60.8 mm (2.39 in)

### PM30

- Dimensions: 106.5 mm (4.19 in) x 50.8 mm (2.0 in)
- Adjustable: 72.9 mm (2.87 in)

Coherent offers a limited warranty for all Thermopile Sensors. For full details of this warranty coverage, please refer to the Service section at [www.coherent.com](http://www.coherent.com) or contact your local Sales or Service Representative.
